sentences.english: Chapter four makes a collection and arrangement in terms of Ho Group Hunting Oracle.
sentences.chinese: 第四章对何组田猎卜辞进行搜集和整理。

sentences.english: Twelve years, evening, asked in the field see don't feel happy hunting.
sentences.chinese: 十二年，暮归，在田野问见田猎者，不觉有喜。

definition: to go on a hunting expedition

pair of annual sacrificial ceremonies held by the emperor in ancient times: one in the southern suburbs of the capital (bringing offerings to Heaven) and another in the northern suburbs (with offerings to Earth)
variant of 宴饗|宴飨[yan4 xiang3]
to host a banquet/feast/banquet/ceremony of sacrifice
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
the lord of Lu (who declined to employ Confucius)
Zhou Dynasty term for a northern nomadic tribe later called the Xiongnu 匈奴[Xiong1 nu2] in the Qin and Han Dynasties
King Xuan, eleventh King of Zhou, reigned (828-782 BC)
